valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 19 Dec 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Sat 20 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low Bailey 977 losing its identity by 0600 tomorrow. New low expected Shannon 987

Southwesterly 6 to gale 8, veering westerly or southwesterly 4 to 6.

Squally showers at first.

Moderate or good.
